title: Pre-Hearing Analysis with Andrea Mitchell and Katy Tur (Hearing #6, 6/28/22)
description: Andrea Mitchell and Katy Tur, along with a range of expert guests, preview the sixth in a series of public hearings by the Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack on the United States Capitol to share the findings of their investigation.
author: multimedia@msnbc.com (MSNBC)
content:encoded: Andrea Mitchell and Katy Tur, along with a range of expert guests, preview the sixth in a series of public hearings by the Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack on the United States Capitol to share the findings of their investigation.
